feed.title: Rallly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed?

Added a fallback to the given_name field when parsing profiles from identity providers.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.5.0...v3.5.1

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed an issue that caused redirect to login to fail when accessing the polls page.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.6.0...v3.6.1

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • âš¡ï¸ Quicker UI updates when adding participant by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1045

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ğŸ› Remove specific ciphers in tls config by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1065
  • â™»ï¸ Switch to using new startTime column by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1041
  • âš¡ï¸ Send finalization emails asynchronously by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1095
  • âœ¨ Show duration by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1098
  • âœ¨ Use dialogs to finalize and duplicate polls by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1099
  • â™»ï¸ Improvements to adding/changing participant by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1108
  • âœ¨ Add option to delete account by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1110
  • â™»ï¸ Remove legacy start column by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1113
  • ğŸ› Fix update options bug by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1116
  • ğŸ› Fix dynamic server usage error by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1117
  • ğŸ’„ Update styles for desktop poll by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1144
  • ğŸ”’ï¸ Remove link to change email by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1156
  • ğŸ”’ï¸ Hide link to login from registration by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1158
  • ğŸ”’ Registration form hardening by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1160
  • âœ¨ New and Improved Screens by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1151
  • âœ¨ Improved time picker logic by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1166
